message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $140?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to offer it to you for $152.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $145?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to offer it to you for $148.
I'm getting close to my budget, Alice. Can you meet me at $145?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer it to you for $146.
